尚.definition: still; yet; to value; to esteem

尚存.definition: still remains; still exists; still has

尚志.definition: Shangzhi, county-level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang

尚志市.definition: Shangzhi, county-level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang

尚慕傑.definition: James Sasser (1936-), US Ambassador to China 1995-1999

尚方劍.definition: imperial sword (giving bearer arbitrary powers); in fiction, Chinese version of 007's license to kill

尚方寶劍.definition: variant of 尚方劍|尚方剑[shang4 fang1 jian4]; imperial sword (giving bearer arbitrary powers); in fiction, Chinese version of 007's license to kill

尚書經.definition: Book of History; a compendium of documents in various styles, making up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the times of Confucius

尚武.definition: to promote a martial spirit; to revere military skills; warlike

尚義.definition: Shangyi county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

尚義縣.definition: Shangyi county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

尚饗.definition: I beg you to partake of this sacrifice (used at the end of an elegiac address)
